animeTitle: Lupin III: Ai no Da Capo - Fujiko's Unlucky Days
animeDescription: When Fujiko acquires and memorizes papers called the Columbus Files, she is attacked and loses her memory. Lupin, a treasure hunter named Rosaria, and the cackling villain Nazaroff all pursue Fujiko, as she is the only key to the location of Columbus' Egg, a treasure connected to the mysterious Orgone Energy.   (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Lupin III, Arsene', 'Jigen, Daisuke', 'Mine, Fujiko', 'Ishikawa XIII, Goemon', 'Zenigata, Kouichi', 'Nazaroff']
animeVoices: ['Kurita, Kanichi', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Masuyama, Eiko', 'Inoue, Makio', 'Naya, Gorou', 'Chiba, Shigeru']
